mapper.select: SELECT fm.*, p.*, n.notop_code, no.notop_content FROM fac_manage fm JOIN process p ON fm.proc_code = p.proc_code JOIN fac_notop n ON fm.fac_code = n.fac_code LEFT JOIN not_operator no ON n.notop_code = no.notop_code
SELECT fm.fac_name, fn.* FROM fac_manage fm JOIN fac_notop fn ON fm.fac_code = fn.fac_code
mapper.delete: DELETE fm, p FROM fac_manage fm INNER JOIN process p ON fm.proc_code = p.proc_code WHERE fm.fac_code = #{facCode}
mapper.insert:
select 'FAC'||LPAD(FAC_CODE_SEQ.NEXTVAL,3,0) FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO fac_manage (fac_code, proc_code, business_code, fac_name, fac_hig, fac_low, fac_date, fac_inscycle, fac_image, fac_person) VALUES (#{facCode}, #{procCode}, #{businessCode}, #{facName}, #{facHig}, #{facLow}, #{facDate}, #{facInscycle}, #{facImage}, #{facPerson})
mapper.update: UPDATE fac_notop SET fac_code = ${facCode}, fac_not_sdate = ${facNotSdate}, fac_not_ldate = ${facNotopLdate}, fac_not_person = ${facNotopPerson}, fac_not_situation = ${facNotopSituation} fac_not_ reason = ${facNotopReason} WHERE fac_not_code = ${facNotopCode}
